/*
IITK1P02.cpp
Created using a template at :
Tue Sep 30 19:03:06 IST 2014
*/
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb push_back
#define pf push_front
#define mp make_pair
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define sz size()
#define ln length()
#define all(a)  a.begin(),a.end() 
#define SI(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define SL(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define PI(n) printf("%d",n)
#define PL(n) printf("%lld",n)
#define PS printf(" ")
#define PN printf("\n")
#define mod 1000000007
#define repf(i,a,b) for(LL i=a;i<=b;i=i+1)
#define repb(i,a,b) for(LL i=b;i>=a;i=i-1)
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);cin.tie(0)

using namespace std;
typedef long long LL;
typedef vector <int> VI;
typedef vector <LL> VL;
typedef map <LL,LL> ML;
typedef vector <pair <LL,LL> > VPL;

int main()
{
	string S;
	cin >> S;
	LL a[27]={0};
	LL L=S.sz;
	LL Max=-1;
	LL l=0;
	while(l<L)
	{
		int c=S[l]-'a';
		
		LL start=l;
		LL count=0;
		while((c==S[start]-'a') && start<L)
		{
			count+=1;
			start+=1;
		}
		a[c]=max(count,a[c]);
		Max=max(Max,a[c]);
		l=start;
	}
	for(LL l=0;l<26;l=l+1)
	{
		if(a[l]==Max)
		{
			char c=l+'a';
			printf("%c\n",c);
			printf("%lld\n",Max);
			break;
		}
	}
   return 0;
}
